description:
A fourth girl at the orphanage, Kurumi, turns out to be Kyo`s classmate. Kyo`s sister, Kurumi, meanwhile, isn`t happy that he hasn`t been spending more time with her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chute et désertion du garçon qui s`enlise et les fillettes de l`église
Teitai Suru Shounen no Kakou to Tousou, Soshite Kyoukai kara Kita Shoujo-tachi
The Boy on Hiatus Descends and Flees, and the Girls from the Church
停滞する少年の下降と逃走, そして教会から来た少女達
정체하는 소년의 하강과 도주, 그리고 성당에서 온 소녀들
